attributes.action: Allow key workers to take driving tests during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: As a critical worker being surrounded by people all day, a safe version of transport allows me to end infection spread completely by avoiding public transport and any of form of contact in transport.
attributes.background: I want this petition go allow key workers in need of a safe transport to be able to take driving tests during this lockdown to ensure they’re safety whilst working front line

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566844
